thread.section_title: ScreenPrinting.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ScreenPrinting.com | screenprinting.com
thread.title: Fairly Local

author: Fairly Local
title: Fairly Local
text: I am new to screenprinting and had purchased some cheaper emulsion from another company. It kept washing out after I burned the screen and being on a fixed budget, I was on the verge of giving up with my first customer. I purchased the green galaxy cryocoat and gave it one last shot. Let me tell you this stuff is fantastic. I am completely satisfied with how it coated, burned and washed out. I have a riley hopkins jr 4-2, flash, ryley cure dryer and exposure unit. All are top notch and are built to last. Couldn't be happier.
